description:
Find what you are looking for quickly with PagineGialle Mobile, the application that lets you discover the world of Italian businesses.
With our app you can get in touch with Italian companies to develop your business. 
And if you travel to Italy it will certainly be useful to have information on 3.8 million Italian business activities that you can search and select with a few simple actions.
The application has a "multilingual" function using the language set in the device and allows you to use the app in the following languages (as well as Italian): English, French, German and Spanish. 

The application is available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch 


Find out what you are looking for, quickly with PagineGialle. 

The application that makes available for iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad information on 3,8 million businesses , which you can look up and choose with quick and simple actions. 

Main features for all versions: 
- Access to Yellow Pages databases 
- The special deal of Glamoo 
- Notification 
- Free and assisted input typing of the search fields 
- Quick search (only one tap) around user localisation for most often searched business categories 
-Quick search customizable
- Browsing through a two-level business categories list useful when you are on the move 
- Reverse look-up by phone number 
- Search results displayed on map 
- Enriched and additional content in the info page for several results, and also web site links, photos, video, etc… 
- Maps in retina and “routing” feature 
- Dynamic display of the current user position 
- Results storing features into the app (Favourits) or into the phone (Contacts, Calendar and Reminders) 
- “Recents” features for previous searches or opened info pages 
- Post results on Facebook, Twitter and G+
- iCloud function to share "Recents" and "Favorites"
- Sharing search results via email or sms 
- App rotation in landscape view 
- Links to TuttoCittà NAV, Navigon, TomTom, Waze,Sygic, Find&Go apps and with the navigation “native” Apple 
- VOIP calls with Skype integration 
- Augmented Reality feature that allows to display the search results overlapping what it’s seen “live” through the phone camera view 
- Starting point of searches can be chosen and modified directly on the map
- Multilingual function
- Specific interface for iPad  
- For iPad, results shown both as a list and on a map in the same screen 
For suggestions or tips, please send us an email to info.mobile@seat.it
